fields.description: Whether or not the user is active
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>
The general identifier of the user
The type (internal, external) of the user
The external name of the user

links.description: Resource allowing the user to change their password
Resource allowing the user to reset their password
Resource representing the roles assigned to this user
Resource representing the user groups assigned to this user
Resource representing the roles inherited by this user
Resource representing the notifications for this user
Resource representing the notification countss for this user
Resource representing the notification states for this user
Resource representing this user's notification subscriptions
Resource representing the projects assigned to this user
Resource representing this user's assignable projects
Resource representing the last date this user successfully logged in
If Gravatar is enabled, a link to the Gravatar icon associated with the user's email address
